channel.title: Hugo on Adrian's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Adrian's Blog

item.title: How to Add TeX Support in Hugo
item.description: In this post I want to show how you can add and properly render TeX code in your Hugo blog. Chances are that you are already familiar with Hugo and with how everything works. If you are not, that’s no problem, you can simply follow this tutorial step by step. Before you start, you should check if your Hugo theme doesn’t already support TeX, else this tutorial is pretty much useless for you.
